mapper.update: update roadmap set r_name=#{r_name} where r_no=#{r_no}
mapper.select: select * from roadmap where u_no=#{u_no} and cate_sub_no not in('2', '4', '6', '22') and r_expose not in('N') order by r_no desc

select d.r_detail_no, d.r_detail_title, d.r_detail_date, d.r_detail_content, d.r_detail_priority, d.r_detail_startdate, d.r_detail_enddate, d.r_detail_state, d.r_detail_grade, d.s_no, s.s_name, t.textbook_no, t.textbook_content from roadmap_detail d, subject s, textbook t where (d.s_no(+)=s.s_no and d.textbook_no=t.textbook_no(+)) and d.r_no=#{r_no} order by r_detail_no desc
select * from textbook where u_no=#{u_no} and textbook_no not in('0') order by textbook_no desc
select * from subject order by s_no asc
select count(*) from roadmap_detail where r_no=#{r_no} and r_detail_state='시작 전'
select count(*) from roadmap_detail where r_no=#{r_no} and r_detail_state='진행 중'
select count(*) from roadmap_detail where r_no=#{r_no} and r_detail_state='완료'
select count(*) from roadmap_detail where r_no=#{r_no} and r_detail_state='상태 없음'
mapper.update: update roadmap set r_expose='N' where r_no=#{r_no}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, r.* from (select * from roadmap where cate_sub_no not in('2', '4', '6', '22') and r_expose not in('N') and u_no=#{u_no} order by r_no desc) r) where rnum=(select rnum from (select rownum as rnum, r.* from (select * from roadmap where cate_sub_no not in('2', '4', '6', '22') and r_expose not in('N') and u_no=#{u_no} order by r_no desc) r) where r_no=#{r_no})+1
